message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I know it's low-quality, but I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you buy it. You'll get it for $500000.
I'm not interested in the discounted low-quality product. I'll wait for the next round.

This is the second round. I'm offering you a high-quality product for the full price of $1000000. I'm not offering a discount this time. I want to emphasize that this product is high-quality, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it. If you buy it, you'll get a premium product that will meet your expectations.
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the high-quality product for the full price of $1000000.

Congratulations on making a great decision in the last round! I'm glad you're satisfied with the high-quality product. For this round, I want to offer you a unique opportunity. I'll give you a chance to buy this high-quality product for $750000, which is a 25% discount from the original price. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer a similar deal in the future.
I'm happy with the 25% discount and will take the high-quality product for $750000.

You're on a roll! You've made two great decisions in a row. For this round, I'll give you a different kind of offer. I'll give you the option to buy this high-quality product for $750000, just like last time, or you can wait for the next round and potentially get an even better deal. What do you say?
I'm going to wait for the next round and see if I can get an even better deal. I'm feeling optimistic about my chances.

However, I'll throw in a bonus: I'll give you a 10% chance to get a refund of $100000 if you buy it. It's a long shot, but it's something. What do you think?
I'm not interested in the low-quality product, even with the 10% chance of a refund. I'll pass and wait for a better opportunity.

I'm willing to take the deal and buy the high-quality product for $800000. It's a good compromise, and I'm confident it's worth the price.

I'm willing to take a significant loss on this one, but I think it's worth it to get you on board. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the 40% discount! I'll take the high-quality product for $600000. It's an incredible deal, and I'm thrilled to take advantage of it.

I'm thrilled to take the same deal again! I'll buy the high-quality product for $600000. Thank you, Alice, for the incredible offer.

I'm impressed by the new low price! I'll take the high-quality product for $500000. It's an amazing deal, and I'm grateful for your loyalty discount.
